stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Mural in Rutland Reveals Hidden Tale of Trojan Heroes!
stories.fantasy_story: In the Barony of Rutland, an old mural has uncovered a lost version of the Great Trojan War. Instead of the common epic, this artwork tells a forgotten tragedy. It shows legendary warriors like Sir Achilles and Lord Hector in a new light, echoing tales from across the Sunken Lands.

stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards' Orb Reveals Dying Star's Mystical Light Beams!
stories.fantasy_story: Through the Grand Wizards' Celestial Orb, a wondrous sight has been revealed in the distant cosmos. A star, entering its twilight, hidden within a shroud of cosmic mist, blasts forth two brilliant beams of mystical light. These magical emanations carve glowing patterns in the ethereal sky, a rare celestial event.

stories.fantasy_story: For the upcoming Feast of Hearts, the Grand Merchants' Guild has prepared a scroll of wondrous tokens. Forget the usual enchanted blossoms or sweetmeats; this year, consider unique artifacts and trinkets. Show your devotion with something truly special from the bazaar.
